glsa.title: ClamAV: Buffer overflow in Freshclam
glsa.synopsis: Freshclam is vulnerable to a buffer overflow that could lead to execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: ClamAV is a GPL virus scanner. Freshclam is a utility to download virus signature updates.

description.p: Ulf Harnhammar and an anonymous German researcher discovered that Freshclam fails to check the size of the header data returned by a webserver.

impact.p: By enticing a user to connect to a malicious webserver an attacker could cause the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ClamAV users should upgrade to the latest version:
